title: Rammus Armor Bug
body: When playing Rammus Armor and Magic Resistance from Runes are not active unless ''W - Defensive Ball Curl'' is active. Thus, when ingame, activating ''W-Defensive Ball Curl'' grants the skill's Armor + your armor and magic resistance from runes. And without W you are reduced to Rammus' base Armor and Magic Resist. {{champion:33}}
